Posts.Content: lollybeth wrote: I have a friend who is 52 years old and was recently diagnosed with Stage IV cancer.  She is being treated with Lupron injections and Femara alone.  Her tumor has shrunk 50% in three months.  Has anyone else heard of this type of treatment -- no surgery, no rads, no chemo...?  Seems very unusual to me and some of her family members.  Dx 7/7/2007, DCIS, 2cm, Stage 0, Grade 2, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stage IV and treated only with Lupron? lollybeth LuAnnH
